title: Jagged Line Paradise
description:
Ten years ago, an infamous serial killer shook our small town in Arizona. Avalon and I were best friends on the brink of becoming more when violence tore through our lives and changed everything. One brutal event broke us.I've been gone for a decade, but now I'm going back to our hometown to film a documentary about the horror that wrecked our blossoming romance. I'm dying to see Avalon again, but she wants nothing to do with me.I don't blame her, but I want her.I want her, even though I know I should stay away from her.I could be dangerous.I am my father's son, after all.
This dark romance book involves triggering elements that may be upsetting for some readers. A complete list of tropes and triggers can be found on the author's website.
author: Brynn Ford
